testimonials.label: Success Stories
testimonials.title: Results that speak volumes
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from café owners who partnered with us
testimonials.customSubtitle: Find out how our happy users are raving about us.

card1.label: Sales increase
card1.quote: Since partnering with Nomad Café, our revenue tripled. The quality of customers is outstanding – they stay longer and order more.
card1.name: Maria Santos

card2.label: Table occupancy
card2.quote: We went from empty mornings to fully booked. Digital nomads found us through this platform and became regulars.
card2.name: James Chen

card3.label: New customers/month
card3.quote: The visibility we gained is incredible. Our café is now the go-to spot for remote workers in Bali.
card3.name: Sofia Rodriguez

footer.statText: Join 500+ café owners growing their business
footer.customStatText: Join 500+ café owners growing their business
footer.dynamicStatText: Join {{count}}+ café owners growing their business

result1.quote: Since partnering with Nomad Cafes, we've seen a huge increase in digital nomad customers. The platform brings exactly the right audience to our café.
result1.author: Clare Smyth

result2.quote: Nomad Cafes helped us optimize our workspace layout and attract remote workers during quiet hours. Our afternoon revenue has never been better.
result2.author: Savannah Nguyen

result3.quote: The review system and detailed workspace information builds trust with nomads. They come once through the platform and become regulars.
result3.author: Arlene McCoy

priceLevel.title: Price Levels
priceLevel.description: Price levels indicate the average cost per item:

wifi.title: WiFi Quality
wifi.description: WiFi ratings are based on download/upload speeds:
wifi.fast: Fast WiFi: 25+ Mbps download, suitable for video calls and streaming
wifi.strong: Strong WiFi: 50+ Mbps download, excellent for heavy work
wifi.reliable: Reliable WiFi: Consistent connection with minimal dropouts

disclaimer.title: Information Source
disclaimer.description: All café information (opening hours, amenities, pricing) is provided by the café owners themselves. While we strive for accuracy, details may change. We recommend verifying critical information directly with the venue.

submitVenue.title: List Your Café or Workspace
submitVenue.description: Are you a café owner or workspace manager? Partner with us to reach thousands of digital nomads and remote workers looking for their next work spot.
submitVenue.emailBody: Hi, I'm interested in listing my café/workspace on Nomad Cafes. Please send me more information about partnership opportunities.
